description:
Osiris is a sentinent plant that the scientist Hisham grew in order to become world-famous. Taking on the form of a half-woman-half-plant creature her task was to defeat Gargoyle.
After the battle with Gargoyle; Hisham pledged that Osiris will focus on intelligence rather than power. In order to communicate; Osiris uses an electric current through her body she to control a simple mobile phone. Through this she can both speak and play ring-tune style music.
name: Osiris
